Features¶

Supported¶

This is a list of things that VIKI supports. If this is not complete please contact The developers.

  • Italian language support
  • Command line arguments
  • Save and open
  • Export to launch file
  • Export to configuration file
  • Parameters
  • Launch prefixes
  • many2many communication (via topics (publisher-subscriber))
  • Distributed systems (over SSH)

Currently unsupported¶

  • communication via services
  • connection to nodes started outside VIKI
  • multiple ROS masters
